channel.title: OGM Q&A: Currency Paradigms, Bitcoin, and more with Ingrid & Pete
channel.description:
Tuesday, Feb 23 -- 90 minutes at 9:30am PST / 12:30pm EST / 18:30 CET
Join Ingrid Lantz and Peter Kaminski as we share questions and answers about how the currency paradigm is shifting, including topics such as fiat currency, reserve currencies, Bitcoin, Ethereum, altcoins, DeFi, community payment and exchange systems, blockchain applications, etc.
Zoom link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84672614466
Forum topic for this Q&A:
"OGM Q&A: Currency Paradigms, Bitcoin, and more with Ingrid & Pete" *you are here*
Mattermost chat during this Q&A:
"[ogm] Calls" https://chat.collectivesensecommons.org/agora/channels/ogm-calls

docs.google.com

OGM Currency Paradigms call, 2021-02-23

Introduction Join Ingrid Lantz and Peter Kaminski and others (feel free to add your name!) as we share questions and answers about how the currency paradigm is shifting, including topics such as fiat currency, reserve currencies, Bitcoin, Ethereum,...

And a new Mattermost channel for continuing the conversation, ‚ÄúBlockchainy‚Äù:

item.title: OGM Q&A: Currency Paradigms, Bitcoin, and more with Ingrid & Pete
item.dc:creator: lovolution
item.description:
and a counterpoint, via kernel cohort
https://www.instagram.com/p/CLkIGvuFESP/?igshid=16q6u17chdf70

‚Äú I can‚Äôt really explain the feeling‚Äìafter decades of ‚Äútraditional art world‚Äù experiences‚Äìof having people find, enjoy, acquire my work on the blockchain. Being paid instantly, getting royalities from secondary sales, and most of all being a part of this welcoming community has really been joyous. Many many thanks! #NFTS #blockchain #aiart #artistsfirst #newarteconomy ‚Äú

item.title: OGM Q&A: Currency Paradigms, Bitcoin, and more with Ingrid & Pete
item.dc:creator: Kevindoylejones
item.description:
I am finding that interesting for a couple of reasons. Indigenous wondering how block chain can help their #landback initiative, and resource, a celo platform startup is based here in asheville and wants to launch a mutual credit implementation for local b2b on the block chain. They are working on making the deck merchant ready and i will introduce them around.
